caption.p: 13C enrichment in 1,8-cineole. Excess values of M+2 and M+3 isotopomeres obtained from GC/MS analysis from spike lavender leaf essential oil (chloroform-d extracts) labelled with 13CO 2 for 5 h. ( A) Ratios of M+2 and M+3 calculated for 6 HMGR5 transgenic plants and 4 wild type (WT) plants. ( B) Mean values of the M+2/M+3 ratios for all HMGR5 plants and all WT plants.
